title: Extract information
original_prompt: Extract the name and mailing address from this email:
input1:
From: John Doe <johndoe@example.com>  
To: Jane Smith <janesmith@example.com>  
Subject: Meeting Reminder  
Dear Jane,  
I hope this message finds you well. I wanted to remind you about our meeting scheduled for next week. Please let me know if you need directions to my office at 123 Main St, Springfield, IL 62701. Looking forward to seeing you!  
Best,  
John
input2:
From: Emily Johnson <emily.johnson@company.com>  
To: Mark Lee <marklee@business.com>  
Subject: Project Update  
Hi Mark,  
I wanted to provide you with an update on the project. If you have any questions, feel free to reach out. You can find me at 456 Elm St, Suite 200, Metropolis, NY 10001.  
Thanks,  
Emily
input1_ans:
Name: John Doe  
Mailing Address: 123 Main St, Springfield, IL 62701
input2_ans:
Name: Emily Johnson  
Mailing Address: 456 Elm St, Suite 200, Metropolis, NY 10001
